### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/T7_4.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/T7_4_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: T7.4.IM.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: T7.4.web.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **VIIRS-Night-Lights** (Cinzano et al. 2019).
 - **VIIRS-Night-Lights** (NOAA NCEI).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset            |url                                                       |
|:------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------|
|VIIRS-Night-Lights |<https://eogdata.mines.edu/products/vnl/>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**T7.4.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.4.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**T7.4.web.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T7.4.web.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091085){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_4_web_orig){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset            |license_info                                        |
|:------------------|:---------------------------------------------------|
|VIIRS-Night-Lights |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/deed.en |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- *VIIRS Day/Night Band Nighttime Lights*, Version 1; **Earth Observation Group, NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI)**. [Data-set]( https://eogdata.mines.edu/download_dnb_composites.html) 
 - Cinzano P, Falchi F, C. D. Elvidge CD  (2019) **The world atlas of the artificial night sky brightness** Copyright Royal Astronomical Society. Reproduced from the Monthly Notices of the RAS by permission of Blackwell Science. University of Padova & NOAA National Geophysical Data Center, Boulder. [Webpage](http://www.inquinamentoluminoso.it/worldatlas/pages/fig1.htm)
